markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spirits' Interference](/Feats.aspx?ID=5834) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=579" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 80 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[spirit instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks. Until your rage ends, anyone making a ranged attack against you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the attack misses with no effect.
name: Spirits' Interference
